Module jakarta.servlet
Package jakarta.servlet.annotation

Annotation Type WebListener

  • @Target(TYPE)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Documented
public @interface WebListener
    This annotation is used to declare a WebListener. Any class annotated with WebListener must implement one or more of the ServletContextListener, ServletContextAttributeListener, ServletRequestListener, ServletRequestAttributeListener, HttpSessionListener, or HttpSessionAttributeListener, or HttpSessionIdListener interfaces.
    Since:
    Servlet 3.0

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      String value
      Description of the listener

    • Element Detail

      • value

        String value
        Description of the listener
        Returns:
        description of the listener
        Default:
        ""
